content: Introducing Accord Royale - a luxurious fragrance with sparkling top notes of Bergamot, Pink Pepper, and Mandarin. A floral heart of Lily of the Valley, Rose, and Jasmine leads to a warm and inviting base of Cashmeran, Musk, and Galaxolide. Embrace the celestial charm of Accord Royale and experience the perfect harmony of sophistication and modernity.
